data.text: @AM800News Those that vote "NO" will be mandated to vote "YES". If you vote "NO", YOUR ACCOUNTS WILL BE FROZEN AND DEFINITELY. The "choice" is yours.

@VoiceOf07623181 @AM800News it's not time?? it's been 2 years! 

The fact vaccinated individual who are over for mere hours have to get tested, yet it won't show they actually caught it while there is absurd!  If someone tests positive on a "short trip", it actually means they caught it in Canada!

@AM800News It’s not time yet, but like the lifting of the prov. restrictions, it’s going to happen sooner not later. Likely before the end of March. People have tapped out on restrictions, lockdowns & the science. They want normalcy, even if it puts them & their family and friends at risk.

@AM800News July 2021 was time to end it for fully vaccinated Canadians. That means it might be considered I. 2022 by Canada’s leaders @jyduclos @marcomendicino @OmarAlghabra @Irek_K @manvirshokar @JustinTrudeau @CPHO_Canada @GovCanHealth
